metadata.title: CVE-2018-5815 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow error within the "parse_qt()" function(internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.12 can beexploited to trigger an infinite loop via a specially crafted AppleQuickTime file.

criterions.comment: ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
